column4: Ok I hate to show up here and ask for help.....but I am at my wits end with my intel integrated wireless (ipw3945)...and yes I know it is supposed to be supported out of the box...but its not, and none of the forum topics have gotten me anywhere...can anyone help?
heh yeh, seen the troubleshooting docs
do you own your own AP?
ummm..stay with wired connectivity for now :)
